document.full_text: former louisiana governor kathleen blanco, who drew criticism for her handling of the crisis in new orleans after hurricane katrina struck the city in 2005, has been diagnosed with a rare form of eye cancer.
document.title: former louisiana gov. kathleen blanco diagnosed with eye cancer
lines_and_colors: former louisiana governor kathleen blanco, who drew criticism for her handling of the crisis in new orleans after hurricane katrina struck the city in 2005, has been diagnosed with a rare form of eye cancer.
